introMessage: Welcome. I'm here to help you create a message...So tell me...What type of message do you want to send. You can respond with: 'Text', 'Image',' or 'Both'.
dateMessage: Great! When would you like to send it? Use the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'
assetMessageText: Go ahead and tell me what you want the message to say...
assetMessageImage: If you have an image, tap below and upload the image...
bothMessage: You have multiple assets. What would you like to upload first? Respond with 'text' or 'image'...
successMsg: Message Saved! You will see it populate now on the calendar.
